trans-unit.source: Azure AD Connect Health Version History
trans-unit.target: Azure AD Connect Health Version History

trans-unit.source: This document describes the releases for Azure AD Connect Health and what has been included in those releases.
trans-unit.target: This document describes the releases for Azure AD Connect Health and what has been included in those releases.

trans-unit.source: Azure AD Connect Health: Version Release History
trans-unit.target: Azure AD Connect Health: Version Release History

trans-unit.source: The Azure Active Directory team regularly updates Azure AD Connect Health with new features and functionality.
trans-unit.target: The Azure Active Directory team regularly updates Azure AD Connect Health with new features and functionality.

trans-unit.source: This article is designed to help you keep track of the versions that have been released.
trans-unit.target: This article is designed to help you keep track of the versions that have been released.

trans-unit.source: January 2016
trans-unit.target: January 2016

trans-unit.source: Agent Update:
trans-unit.target: Agent Update:

trans-unit.source: Azure AD Connect Health agent for AD FS (version 2.6.91.1512)
trans-unit.target: Azure AD Connect Health agent for AD FS (version 2.6.91.1512)

trans-unit.source: New features:
trans-unit.target: New features:

trans-unit.source: Test Connectivity Tool for Azure AD Connect Health Agents
trans-unit.target: Test Connectivity Tool for Azure AD Connect Health Agents

trans-unit.source: November 2015
trans-unit.target: November 2015

trans-unit.source: New features:
trans-unit.target: New features:

trans-unit.source: Support for [Role Based Access Control](active-directory-aadconnect-health-operations.md#manage-access-with-role-based-access-control)
trans-unit.target: Support for [Role Based Access Control](active-directory-aadconnect-health-operations.md#manage-access-with-role-based-access-control)

trans-unit.source: New preview features:
trans-unit.target: New preview features:

trans-unit.source: [Azure AD Connect Health for sync](active-directory-aadconnect-health-sync.md).
trans-unit.target: [Azure AD Connect Health for sync](active-directory-aadconnect-health-sync.md).

trans-unit.source: Fixed issues:
trans-unit.target: Fixed issues:

trans-unit.source: Bug fixes for errors seen during agent registrations.
trans-unit.target: Bug fixes for errors seen during agent registrations.

trans-unit.source: September 2015
trans-unit.target: September 2015

trans-unit.source: New features:
trans-unit.target: New features:

trans-unit.source: Wrong Username password report for AD FS
trans-unit.target: Wrong Username password report for AD FS

trans-unit.source: Support to configure Unauthenticated HTTP Proxy
trans-unit.target: Support to configure Unauthenticated HTTP Proxy

trans-unit.source: Support to configure agent on Server core
trans-unit.target: Support to configure agent on Server core

trans-unit.source: Improvements to Alerts for AD FS
trans-unit.target: Improvements to Alerts for AD FS

trans-unit.source: Improvements in Azure AD Connect Health Agent for AD FS for connectivity and data upload.
trans-unit.target: Improvements in Azure AD Connect Health Agent for AD FS for connectivity and data upload.

trans-unit.source: Fixed issues:
trans-unit.target: Fixed issues:

trans-unit.source: Bug fixes in Usage Insights for AD FS Error types.
trans-unit.target: Bug fixes in Usage Insights for AD FS Error types.

trans-unit.source: June 2015
trans-unit.target: June 2015

trans-unit.source: Initial release of Azure AD Connect Health for AD FS and AD FS Proxy.
trans-unit.target: Initial release of Azure AD Connect Health for AD FS and AD FS Proxy.

trans-unit.source: New features:
trans-unit.target: New features:

trans-unit.source: Alerts for monitoring AD FS and AD FS Proxy servers with email notifications.
trans-unit.target: Alerts for monitoring AD FS and AD FS Proxy servers with email notifications.

trans-unit.source: Easy access to AD FS topology and patterns in AD FS Performance Counters.
trans-unit.target: Easy access to AD FS topology and patterns in AD FS Performance Counters.

trans-unit.source: Trend in successful token requests on AD FS servers grouped by Applications, Authentication Methods, Request Network Location etc.
trans-unit.target: Trend in successful token requests on AD FS servers grouped by Applications, Authentication Methods, Request Network Location etc.

trans-unit.source: Trends in failed request on AD FS servers grouped by Applications, Error Types etc.
trans-unit.target: Trends in failed request on AD FS servers grouped by Applications, Error Types etc.

trans-unit.source: Simpler Agent Deployment using Azure AD Global Admin credentials.
trans-unit.target: Simpler Agent Deployment using Azure AD Global Admin credentials.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: Learn more about [Monitor your on-premises identity infrastructure and synchronization services in the cloud](active-directory-aadconnect-health.md).
trans-unit.target: Learn more about [Monitor your on-premises identity infrastructure and synchronization services in the cloud](active-directory-aadconnect-health.md).
